Target: people who had come into contact with the container
Polar_expression: suffering acute health effects from radiation

text: Yesterday [ 07 January ] , the National Institute of Radiation Protection ( SSI ) announced that it could not exclude the possibility of people who had come into contact with the container suffering acute health effects from radiation . The event is classified as a level - three incident on the International Nuclear Event Scale ( INES ) , and is the most serious ever in Sweden .
